name: ConstructHome
description:
PERFORMANCE FOR DEVICES UNKNOWN! 

This game is for my Math Final. I will update this in the following days with ideas and required additions for a good grade. I may update this game after I get the grade, but that isn't guaranteed. 

This is also my first game ever released! Be honest with your reviews, I want to learn and make my future games better with every release!

This game uses all assets from Quixel Bridge provided with Unreal Engine 5. No Meshes, Textures, or Foliage belong to me.
